thread.title_full: Couple caught ‘having sex’ while riding motorbike on motorway

author: tmeyjes
title: Couple caught ‘having sex’ while riding motorbike on motorway
text:
The couple appeared to be having sex while driving on a motorway (Picture:CEN) When it comes to having al fresco sex, this couple appear to be pushing the boundaries further than most. 
Footage showing the pair in a compromising position on a motorway near Encarnacion has been handed to police in Paraguay.
Haunting pictures show the forgotten starving children of South Sudan Needless to say the semi-naked couple puzzled motorists driving past one of whom shot the video on their phone.
It shows the woman lying on the petrol tank with her skirt hitched up and her legs wrapped around the shirtless male rider.
Many have pointed out that neither were wearing a helmet but we suspect that is the least of their worries.
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Police are investigating the incident (Picture: CEN) The couple could be fined three million PYG (£430) if the footage is verified.
